title: Create SOP-003 (Deviation Management) and SOP-004 (Document Execution)

comment: Pre-review complete. CR-009 is well-structured and comprehensive. The proposed SOPs address gaps identified by INV-001, particularly: (1) Scope integrity requirements in SOP-004 Section 6.6 directly address the root cause of CR-005 scope deviation; (2) CAPA tracking within INVs provides formal structure for corrective actions; (3) Evidence requirements formalize documentation expectations. Alignment with SOP-001 and SOP-002 is correct. No TU reviewers required - this is procedural documentation governing QMS operations, not technical domain changes. Minor observation for implementation: ensure SOP-003 Section 5.7 clarifies that CAPA child-CR verification occurs during INV post-review by QA.

Post-review complete per SOP-002 Section 7.3. Verified: (1) All execution items EI-1 through EI-7 show status COMPLETE with evidence documented; (2) SOP-003 v1.0 is EFFECTIVE; (3) SOP-004 v1.0 is EFFECTIVE. Both SOPs align with CR-009 approved outlines and properly cross-reference each other and SOP-001/SOP-002. INV-001 lessons learned are explicitly incorporated in SOP-004 Section 6.6. All post-review requirements satisfied.
